決.definition: to decide; to determine; to execute (sb); (of a dam etc) to breach or burst; definitely; certainly

決一雌雄.definition: see 一決雌雄|一决雌雄[yi1 jue2 ci2 xiong2]

決勝.definition: to determine victory; to obtain victory

決勝千里.definition: to be able to plan victory from a thousand miles away (idiom)

決口.definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its banks; (of a dam) to burst

決定.definition: to decide (to do something); to resolve; decision; CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]; certainly

決心.definition: determination; resolution; determined; firm and resolute; to make up one's mind; CL:個|个[ge4]

決戰.definition: decisive battle; to fight a decisive battle; to fight for supremacy in ...

決斷.definition: to make a decision; resolution; decisiveness; resolute

決策.definition: strategic decision; decision-making; policy decision; to determine policy

決算.definition: final account; to calculate the final bill; fig. to draw up plans to deal with sth

決絕.definition: to sever all relations with sb; determined; decisive

決裂.definition: to rupture; to burst open; to break; to break off relations with; a rupture

決議.definition: a resolution; to pass a resolution

決隄.definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its dike; (of dikes) to collapse

決鬥.definition: to duel; a duel; decisive struggle
